name: py-python-javabridge

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
The python-javabridge package makes it easy to start a Java virtual
machine (JVM) from Python and interact with it.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-cython
dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description:
The Java Development Kit (JDK) released by Oracle Corporation in the
form of a binary product aimed at Java developers. Includes a complete
JRE plus tools for developing, debugging, and monitoring Java
applications.

dependent_to.name: py-python-bioformats
dependent_to.description:
Python-bioformats is a Python wrapper for Bio-Formats, a standalone Java
library for reading and writing life sciences image file formats. Bio-
Formats is capable of parsing both pixels and metadata for a large
number of formats, as well as writing to several formats.
